name: Battlezone (1998)
description:
Battlezone (1998) is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Activision, Climax Group, small and Big Boat Interactive. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by Rebellion. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Battlezone (1998) on Nintendo 64 and PC.
Mike Arkin produced the game. It was directed by Andrew Goldman. It was scored by Jeehun Hwang.
